member.name: T:Khoan.Api.Controllers.DataImportController
member.summary: Provides import history and simple preview/cleanup endpoints to support the B9 UI. Note: DirectImport writes directly to domain tables; this controller surfaces metadata in ImportedDataRecords and offers lightweight preview by looking up rows in the corresponding table by NGAY_DL (StatementDate).

member.summary: Direct-preview: return available data types with record counts. Frontend calls: GET /api/DataImport/direct-preview/data-types

member.name: M:Khoan.Api.Controllers.DataImportController.GetStatistics
member.summary: Direct-preview: overall statistics for all tables. Frontend calls: GET /api/DataImport/direct-preview/statistics

member.name: M:Khoan.Api.Controllers.DataImportController.GetRecords(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns recent import records. The frontend expects a plain array.

member.summary: Simple preview by import id: returns first N rows for the table/type and StatementDate.

member.name: M:Khoan.Api.Controllers.DataImportController.PreviewLite(System.Int32)
member.summary: Ultra-light preview that always returns a minimal JSON object without DateTime types. Useful as a temporary workaround for DateTime converter issues.

member.summary: Delete data rows by dataType and statement date (yyyy-MM-dd or yyyyMMdd). Also cleans metadata records.
